summary: Tested pCloud contributor feature - auto-sync tasks, pCloud section form with upload/viewing links, contributor page at /p/{link}, and public gallery contributors section. All features working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Auto-sync tasks for Google Drive and pCloud are running (confirmed in backend logs)
pCloud section form has 'pCloud Upload Request Link *' (required) field
pCloud section form has 'pCloud Viewing/Share Link (Optional)' field
Creating pCloud section without viewing URL but with upload link succeeds
Contributor link generation for pCloud sections uses /p/ prefix
Step 1: Your Details (Name required, Role optional)
Step 2: Upload Photos to pCloud (opens upload link in new tab)
Step 3: Sync Your Photos to Gallery (manual sync with viewing link)
Public gallery 'WITH' section shows contributors from all section types
seed_data_creation: Created TEST_pCloud_Contributor section for testing (cleaned up)
context_for_next_testing_agent: pCloud contributor feature fully tested. Key test URLs: Contributor page at /p/DxujJsJZP_PbAhB8uIORyA was tested (section deleted after test). Gallery ID for Test GDrive Gallery: 9c18f814-2d34-4009-9b68-e4bb181f2549. Public gallery with contributors: https://pictreasury.preview.emergentagent.com/g/465f44a9

auto_sync_gdrive_task.details: Backend logs show 'Google Drive auto-sync task started'

auto_sync_pcloud_task.details: Backend logs show 'pCloud auto-sync task started'

pcloud_form_upload_link_field.details: pCloud Upload Request Link * (required) field visible in form

pcloud_form_viewing_link_field.details: pCloud Viewing/Share Link (Optional) field visible in form

create_empty_pcloud_section.details: POST /api/galleries/{id}/pcloud-sections with null pcloud_url creates empty section

pcloud_contributor_link_prefix.details: pCloud sections use /p/ prefix for contributor links

pcloud_contributor_page_access.details: Contributor page at /p/{link} loads correctly with 3-step form

pcloud_contributor_page_step2.details: Step 2: Upload Photos to pCloud button opens upload link

pcloud_contributor_page_step3.details: Step 3: Sync Now (Manual) button shows viewing link form

public_gallery_contributors.details: Public gallery 'WITH' section shows contributors from all section types

validation_errors.details: Missing name returns 400, missing URL returns 400, invalid URL returns 400
